title: Utility Bruiser Sion
body:
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/99kc6l/utility_bruiser_sion_is_busted/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SDLFRI8FBdY

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3a8UYHzYyNY&feature=youtu.be

Items:

Lane Dorans Shield/Sword or Potion

Back: Tiamat

Trinity->Merc/Tabi->Steraks/Titanic->Gargoyles->ZzRots or Aegis

Conq -> Gargoyles -> Steraks-> Trinity Sheen Proc + Titanics AA -> Aegis

TP F

Conq,Triumph,Tenacity,Last Stand;Demolish,Overgrowth

Q->W->R->E

To Juice it up:

​

Triple Tank Team:

Sion B

Cho B

Ornn T

Udyr J

Veigar M

Cho Utility Build

Titanic Righteous into Fulltank Zzrots

Ornn Aegis

​

Ornn Utility Build:

Fulltank Aegis

Ornn Aegis/Sunfire/Mask

​

Udyr Build

Trinity+...

Ornn Trinity

​

Veigar TP/B/H/E

Mask, Banshees Zhonyas Seraphs Voidstaff PenBoots
